'''''Calling Down the Thunder''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] that occurs in [[Inazuma]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|Some scoundrels are up to no good, researching an object that possesses the power of [[Electro]]. Stop them, and quick!}}
# Defeat all opponents

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}

==Enemies==
All locations have an Electro [[Infusion Stone]].

===Kannazuka===
;Version between [[Pyro Hypostasis]] and [[Kujou Encampment]]
:Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}
:Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Kairagi: Fiery Might*1}}

;Version east of [[Kujou Encampment]]
:Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Nobushi: Jintouban;Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}
:Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Kairagi: Dancing Thunder*1}}

;Version at southwest of [[Tatarasuna]]
:Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Crackling Axe Mitachurl;Electro Samachurl}}
:Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Crackling Axe Mitachurl;Electro Hilichurl Grenadier;Hilichurl Grenadier}}

===Yashiori Island===
;Version near [[Musoujin Gorge]]
:Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Kairagi: Dancing Thunder;Nobushi: Hitsukeban;Nobushi: Kikouban}}
:Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Kairagi: Fiery Might;Nobushi: Jintouban*2}}

;Version south of [[Higi Village]], at the camp near the [[Waverider Waypoint]]
:Wave 1 {{Enemy List|Fatui Pyroslinger Bracer;Fatui Geochanter Bracer;Fatui Pyro Agent}}
:Wave 2 {{Enemy List|Fatui Anemoboxer Vanguard;Fatui Electrohammer Vanguard}}
